title: ZWave
extract: Z-Wave is a wireless network designed by Zensys Inc. to provide communication between devices in a home control network. Z-Wave may be used to control lights, heating and air conditioning, and appliances and home security, among other functions.
extract_html: Z-Wave is a wireless network designed by Zensys Inc. to provide communication between devices in a home control network. Z-Wave may be used to control lights, heating and air conditioning, and appliances and home security, among other functions.
